text.tspan: Industrial water as a share of total water withdrawals, 1980 to 2021
Industrial water withdrawals as a percentage of total water withdrawals (which is the sum of water used for
Data source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations, OECD, and World Bank (2025)
Note: The industrial water sector refers to self-supplied industries not connected to the public distribution network. The ratio between net
consumption and withdrawal is estimated at less than 5%. It includes water for the cooling of thermoelectric and nuclear power plants, but it
